channel.title: Posts on eloquent
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on eloquent

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to this hidden corner of the internet. I’m going to use this site to record some of my thoughts, and hopefully improve my writing skills along the way. For starters, I’ve been following this book club and slowly reading Seneca’s Letters on Ethics, writing a response to each one. If I feel that there’s any insight in my writings, I’ll share them here. I also plan to talk about different self improvement topics, and maybe the occasional technical subject.
